name: The Cave (itch) (santsote)
description:
Story

You are Garry Steward, an excellent EEUU soldier, who was requested to a save your captain, Colton Jones. The rescue mision is situated in the planet Kepler 37-b. It turns out that the planet is crowded with numerous aliens. You need to make your way towards the captain and escape.

Controls

WASD to Move

Mouse to Look around

Left Mouse Click to shoot

R to recharge

F to interact

Space to jump

Q / E / C for purchasable abilities
